message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a price that is significantly lower than its market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
